IMUSA USA was founded in Colombia in 1934. IMUSA was the first manufacturer of aluminum pots and pans in the country. Today, IMUSA is a respected brand with 80 years of experience in Hispanic and International cookware, with over 20 years of expericne in the US marketplace.
